14 // By default, loads blocks without multiple layer support.
15 // Loading blocks assumes that the layer is already setup and allocated, while
16 // loading the full layer (below) allocates a layer of the correct size instead.
17 template <typename VoxelType>
18 bool LoadBlocksFromFile(
19  const std::string& file_path,
20  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockMergingStrategy strategy,
21  Layer<VoxelType>* layer_ptr);
22 
23 template <typename VoxelType>
24 bool LoadBlocksFromFile(
25  const std::string& file_path,
26  typename Layer<VoxelType>::BlockMergingStrategy strategy,
27  bool multiple_layer_support, Layer<VoxelType>* layer_ptr);
28 
29 // Unlike LoadBlocks above, this actually allocates the layer as well.
30 // By default loads without multiple layer support (i.e., only checks the first
31 // layer in the file).
32 template <typename VoxelType>
33 bool LoadLayer(const std::string& file_path,
34  typename Layer<VoxelType>::Ptr* layer_ptr);
35 template <typename VoxelType>
36 bool LoadLayer(const std::string& file_path, const bool multiple_layer_support,
37  typename Layer<VoxelType>::Ptr* layer_ptr);
38 
39 // By default, clears (truncates) the output file. Set clear_file to false in
40 // case writing the second (or subsequent) layer into the same file.
41 template <typename VoxelType>
42 bool SaveLayer(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer, const std::string& file_path,
43  bool clear_file = true);
44 
45 // Saves only some parts of the layer to the file. Clears the file by default.
46 template <typename VoxelType>
47 bool SaveLayerSubset(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer,
48  const std::string& file_path,
49  const BlockIndexList& blocks_to_include,
50  bool include_all_blocks);
